name: Aadhar
body:
This is Rails engine to support basic token-based authentication. 

Add following line in you Gemfile

```
gem 'aadhar'
```

Execute following command to instal 'aadhar' engine

```
rake aadhar:install:migrations
rake db:migrate
```

After installation following APIs will be available
1. Registration
2. Login
3. Logout
4. Reset password
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
